1.0.name: wordpress/demomentsomtres-facebook-events-list
1.0.description:
This plugin generates a list of events from a Facebook fan page. The events list can be put in any post or page that uses shortcodes.

You must have a Facebook developer account with an application ID and application secret. To request one, please visit Facebook

To use the plugin, simply include the short-code [fb_event_list appid="" appsecret="" pageid=""] in a post or page.

Demo

You can try it: http://www.harmonicus.com/catala/actes

Credits

Based on code by Mike Dalisay http://www.codeofaninja.com/2011/07/display-facebook-events-to-your-website.html Adapted by Jon Smith http://www.wordsmith-communication.co.u
